if.test: pageParam != null and pageParam.pageNo != null and pageParam.pageSize != null

mapper.sql:
SELECT
F_BDBH AS fBdbh, F_GZPTHWZBM AS fGzpthwzbm, F_GZPMC AS fGzpmc, F_CXDL AS fCxdl, F_ZCCX AS fZccx, F_SSYJLBJ AS fSsyjlbj, F_SCDW AS fScdw, F_GZMC AS fGzmc, F_GZDM AS fGzdm, F_GZHG AS fGzhg, F_GZDJ AS fGzdj, F_GZFSSJ AS fGzfssj, F_XMMC AS fXmmc, F_XMH AS fXmh, F_ZYZRDW AS fZyzrdw FROM scene_fault_label /*"_SYS_BIC"."com.CRRC.POC/CV_XCGZ_V"*/
1=1
AND f_gzpxh = #{cond.sqn}
GROUP BY F_BDBH, F_GZPTHWZBM, F_GZPMC, F_CXDL, F_ZCCX, F_SSYJLBJ, F_SCDW, F_GZMC, F_GZDM, F_GZHG, F_GZDJ, F_GZFSSJ, F_XMMC, F_XMH, F_ZYZRDW
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select f_gzpthwzbm,f_gzpmc from scene_fault_label where f_gzpthwzbm like concat('%', #{fGzpthwzbm},'%') group by f_gzpthwzbm,f_gzpmc) newTable
